name: Cyber Blader (Pre-Errata)
text:
"Etoile Cyber" + "Blade Skater"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. This card gains the following effect, based on the number of monsters your opponent controls. 
? 1: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. 
? 2: Double this card's ATK. 
? 3: Negate the effects of your opponent's Spell, Trap, and Effect Monster Cards.
